events.text: Let's look at that time where you have been tagged from a stranger's post.
It looks like you chose to keep the tag on.
Remember, that this would be seen by anyone! It would be better to remove tags from strangers as this can reveal your information to people you do not know!
You have allowed anyone to tag you in their post.
Please consider setting it to another option like "Always Review" or "No one can tag" to give you control over  your data.
